name: Suicide SnAIk
description:
This is your average snake game on Nokia. But wait! Your goal is to die instead of surviving!

This game delivers the original Snake game, with a surprising twist. Your goal isn't to survive and grow, but to die.
Explore the hand-crafted levels of SnAIk each packed with its unique way to die, or just enjoy being a pro in endless mode! (Where the AI is on your side)

This is a game made for the Nokia Jam 2020 hosted by phillip. Thank for hosting this amazing game jam! :)

Controls:

LeftLeft ArrowRIghtRight ArrowUpUp ArrowDownDown ArrowSelect (Menu)Space/EnterBack (Menu & In-game)Esc
